text: Egh a kamaghɨn garir gumazir igiaba iniam: me guar aghuiba ikɨva, namnar aghuiba ikɨva, egh tav mɨkarzir tam ikuvighan kogh, egh fofozir avɨriba ikɨva, suren aghuibar amuva, uaghan zuamɨra fofozim inigham. Eghtɨ me atrivimɨn dɨpenimɨn ingaramin fofozim ikiam. Egh Aspenas uabɨ men sure damutɨ me Babilonɨn akam osirɨva egh a dɨponam.
